reviews.review: Охуенная игра, удалю ее пока не подсел! Если вы гомосексуал и вам нравиться когда какой-то очкодуй убивает вас за пол карты, через 3 стены, зажимом с Р90и ещё и в голову, тогда да- это ваша игра.

The game hates me and I hate the game. That's the symbiotic circle of Counter-Strike. Let the hate flow, beat it and everyone else, while being accused of hacking.
Fantastic!!
Jogo extremamente ótimo para quem quer se estressar atoa

Personally i used to love this game but after it being free to play it just got ran over by people that we're finally able to cheat without having to spend 20bucks on a new copy of the game. Sadly this makes My review Lower then what i would've given it a few years ago

Joguei por anos, peguei cherife e depois enjoei de ficar marcando o mesmo pixel o jogo todo
Great competitive shooter. Might want to buy prime or use Faceit to get rid of the cheaters.
